name: Shotguns & blades
description:
a 2d shooty shooty bang bang game for anyone who wants a good time playing some games.

Shoot zombs and collect weapons,medkits and also scores

Take a death sight and show your friends how much you stranded in this hell of a room

Try diffrent tactics and guns to destroy as much as zombs as you can

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • SHIFT to use a medkit
  • LEFT CLICK to shoot
  • RIGHT CLICK to deploy a dynamite
  • SPACE to pickup guns(when hovering over them)

If you forgot any,you can alaways check out the hell menu
